long_description: The angle-adjustable JVC ADIXXION Chest Mount harness facilitates hands-free recording with your ADDIXION or ADDIXION 2 action camera from your chest outward, or pointed up toward your face. Nylon webbing straps; durable plastic baseplate and quick-release buckle.
short_description: The angle-adjustable JVC ADIXXION Chest Mount harness facilitates hands-free recording with your ADDIXION or ADDIXION 2 action camera from your chest outward, or pointed up toward your face.
